channel.title: I need help! Please help me!
channel.description:
Thank you for taking your time to red this! I am new at this whole creating a server thing, so i need help!
I found a great tutorial, but there is one thing that NO ONE can tell me! To modify stuff you need to go to client.java... i downloaded 6 programs, and all there is is client (notepad), and client.class
HELP ME!!! [br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 10:19:15 AM[/size][hr]Oh yeah... and plus there is one more thing.... The tutorial guy is using evilscape, so i got it to, but when i log on to mooparscaoe with the server (Port is: 1234) it tells me im already logged in...

item.title: I need help! Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @wiseman wiseman
item.description:
@wiseman wrote:

Wow, ollie123, those are big words for a small computer nerd like yourself, what do you say, jerk?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 10:52:59 AM[/size][hr]Thanx for your help everyone, but since i can’t tell you what the problem is i will have to show you;
Check out the ducument, on it there is the photo of the screen and the problem…

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! Please help me!

item.title: I need help! Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

1: Learn To Use A Computer
2: Spell Properly
3: Right Click On Client (Notepad) And Click “Open With”, Then Click Notepad And Press OK

Please,Please,Please,Please,Please,Please,Please,Please,Please,Please,Please, Grow A Brain?!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! Please help me!

item.title: I need help! Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @runescapekid runescapekid
item.description:
@runescapekid wrote:

you must download a source. if you do not have one that is why it is not working. once you have one there are 2 files called “client” one is a notepad one is a page with a blue notepad. click the on that is just the white notepad

hope it helped

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! Please help me!

item.title: I need help! Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok you should see 2 clients in you folder ones client.java and the other is client.class goto the side of your screen to find the details and if it says client.java then open client .java and if you still cant figure it out then open up both until you see letters like evilscape updates or something like that

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! Please help me!

item.title: I need help! Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @wiseman wiseman
item.description:
@wiseman wrote:

i dont think you understand… i tried 5 different guides, they all say “well done! now open up client.java and do this and that and the trick is done”… WHAT AND WHERE IS CLIENT.JAVA? DO THEY MEAN CLIENT.CLASS? HOW DO YOU OPEN IT!? WHAT DO I DO???

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! Please help me!

item.title: I need help! Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Nwfd1025 Nwfd1025
item.description:
@Nwfd1025 wrote:

Well… there us a Server guide tutorial for how to learn to make one. you should look at that.

It has everything you will need to know.

Read full topic
